Package: com.github.jrubygradle.war

[Groovy] Class JRubyWar

      • com.github.jrubygradle.war.JRubyWar

      • Authors:
        R. Tyler Croy

        • Properties Summary

            Properties 
            Type Name and description
            static java.lang.String  JRUBYWAR_CONFIG
            static java.lang.String  JRUBYWAR_MAINCLASS
            java.lang.String  mainClass
            Setting the main class allows for a runnable War.

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            void copy()
            static void updateJRubyDependencies(Project project)
            Update dependencies on the project to include those necessary for building JRubyWar's

        • Property Detail

          • static final java.lang.String JRUBYWAR_CONFIG

          • static final java.lang.String JRUBYWAR_MAINCLASS

          • @Input java.lang.String mainClass

            Setting the main class allows for a runnable War. By default the value is JRUBYWAR_MAINCLASS

          • @java.lang.Override void copy()

            Update dependencies on the project to include those necessary for building JRubyWar's
